name: Hugh
author: Alec Rust <me@alecrust.com>
description: A simple helpful robot running on OpenShift

scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDIS_PASSWORD@$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_HOST:$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_PORT HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN=$HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN bin/hubot -n Hugh -a slack
